bug.author: gpengzhi
bug.summary: A potential bug in transformer example
bug.description:
When I run <denchmark-code>sh scripts/wmt14_en_de.sh </denchmark-code>
An error is triggered: <denchmark-code>(venv) pgao@daoyuan:~/texar-pytorch/examples/transformer$ sh scripts/wmt14_en_de.sh Writing to data/en_de_temp//cache. To change this, set the OUTPUT_DIR_CACHE environment variable. Downloading Europarl v7. comments.comment: Hi <denchmark-link:https://github.com/haoransh>@haoransh</denchmark-link> , it seems that you are the author of example. Can you take a look at this issue and make sure that the entire pipeline of this example can work on data? Thanks.
You may also want to check the transformer example in texar-tf. It might have a similar issue.
This bug is fixed by adding mkdir -p ${OUTPUT_DIR_CACHE} at line 26.
